title: Pack and Manifest an Order
description: A packer at a packing station needs to pack a picked order, select the correct box size, and generate a shipping label.

tasks.description: Scan the barcode on the picked tote to retrieve the order details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly retrieves the order items and shipping address.

tasks.description: Based on the items, select the appropriate box size from the available options.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent chooses a cost-effective and appropriately sized box.

tasks.description: Pack the items, weigh the package, and generate the final shipping label from the integrated shipping system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates and prints a carrier-compliant shipping label.
